description: Google DeepMind’s Aeneas model uses AI to reconstruct damaged ancient Roman inscriptions with high accuracy. Its ability to fill in missing text, estimate origins, and connect similar inscriptions makes it a game-changer for historical research. Open-source and free to use, it opens new possibilities in the study of ancient history.
title: Aeneas AI Model Helps Decode and Restore Ancient Roman Inscriptions

description: A breakthrough in creative robotics, Robot Drummer combines AI and humanoid design to perform complex drumming patterns with precision and flair. The system could inspire future innovations in robotic musicianship and live entertainment.
title: Robot Drummer: Humanoid Robot Learns to Play Drums with Human-Like Precision

description: Astronomers have confirmed that the blazar OJ 287 hosts the most extreme binary black hole system ever found. Using a global radio telescope array, they captured an ultra-sharp image showing a dramatically bent jet—evidence of two supermassive black holes locked in orbit. The system’s 12-year flare cycle and jet twists match predictions of a smaller companion black hole disturbing the primary’s disk. This discovery offers new insights into galaxy evolution, black hole mergers, and gravitational wave detection, making OJ 287 a prime target for future space observatories like LISA.
title: Twisted Jet Confirms Most Extreme Binary Black Hole System in the Universe

description: Hubble has captured its sharpest image of 3I/ATLAS, a rare interstellar comet speeding through the solar system at 130,000 mph. The view reveals a dust-filled coma, a faint tail, and activity similar to native comets. Astronomers aim to study its composition before it vanishes forever, offering insight into objects formed around other stars.
title: Hubble Delivers Best View Yet of Rare Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS Racing Through Solar System

description: Now streaming on Aha Tamil, Chakravyuham: The Trap is a Telugu murder mystery that follows S.I. Satya’s investigation into the killing of Siri. Released in 2023, the film offers suspense, family drama, and shocking revelations, making it a must-watch for crime thriller fans.
title: Chakravyuham Now Available for Streaming on Aha Tamil: Everything You Need to Know

description: A new Indian Spy thriller, set in 1978, when a RAW agent based in Pakistan, and an undercover serving as a tuition teacher, find out about Pakistan's Nuclear program and expose it. But this doesn't end, as this incident and the enemies of the past are woke again in 2025. A tale of patriotism unfolds in the series, threatening the security of the country and how the agent sacrifices and saves the country.
title: Salakaar Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know

description: The new anime Otherworldly Munchkin: Let's Speedrun the Dungeon with Only 1 Hp, where Yukito, who dies saving his sister Sana, is promised an incarnation, with 1Hp, he tries to save his sister. A bond of a brother and sister so pure is coming this October on Crunchyroll. Stay Tuned.
title: Otherworldly Munchkin: Let's Speedrun the Dungeon with Only 1 HP OTT Release Date Revealed

description: The Runarounds is the new prime series, where a group of friends make a band together and aspire to be musicians. During one summer, the band gets a big break, and instead of following the mundane career path, they fall in love and trouble along the way, releasing their album on September 1.
title: The Runarounds OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?
